/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with modern buildings, their glass and steel facades reflecting the bright sunlight. Trees dot the sidewalk, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
